entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Milk River
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries near noon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this afternoon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 11 March 2023
